amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $1,000,000 for research and development on the heavy fuel diesel engine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4918 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4918 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S9092; text: CR S9092) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $1,000,000 for research and development on the heavy fuel diesel engine.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4918 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4918 proposed by Senator Stevens.
